title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 220 - Portland Cement Plants And Glass Plants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 220 - Portland Cement Plants And Glass Plants

State Regulations

Subpart 220-1 - Portland Cement Plants (§ 220-1.1 to 220-1.7)

Subpart 220-2 - Glass Plants (§ 220-2.1 to 220-2.4)

Subpart 220-3 - Asphalt Mixture Manufacturing Plants (§ 220-3.1 to 220-3.11)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 220

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 19-0311

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Subpart 220-1 - Portland Cement Plants (§ 220-1.1 to 220-1.7)

Subpart 220-2 - Glass Plants (§ 220-2.1 to 220-2.4)

Subpart 220-3 - Asphalt Mixture Manufacturing Plants
